name: odest_spawn_04
text: From the outer dark I come.

text: From the fortress afloat in the dark.

name: odest_ability_imprison_12
text: Take some time to think it over.

name: odest_levelup_01
text: My wings beat with the rhythms of eternity.
text_simple: my wings beat with the rhythms of eternity

name: odest_levelup_07
text: I can see my homeworld from here.
text_simple: i can see my homeworld from here

name: odest_levelup_08
text: Good news travels slowly, bad news has wings.
text_simple: good news travels slowly bad news has wings

name: odest_kill_03
text: My wings beat where your heart does not.
text_simple: my wings beat where your heart does not

name: odest_kill_06
text: A mind prepared, a death foretold.
text_simple: a mind prepared a death foretold

name: odest_kill_08
text: That sharp pain you felt was my intellect.
text_simple: that sharp pain you felt was my intellect

name: odest_kill_09
text: Serrated wings of wisdom cut you down.
text_simple: serrated wings of wisdom cut you down

name: odest_kill_12
text: I was the harbinger of that.
text_simple: i was the harbinger of that

name: odest_rival_01
text: I am one darkness you must not have seen.
text_simple: i am one darkness you must not have seen

name: odest_rival_02
text: If you had looked for true harbingers, you might have prophesied your own demise.
text_simple: if you had looked for true harbingers you might have prophesied your own demise

name: odest_rival_03
text: It was in my nature to destroy you, Prophet.
text_simple: it was in my nature to destroy you prophet

name: odest_rival_04
text: Harbinger of bad news for Anti-Mage.
text_simple: harbinger of bad news for antimage

name: odest_rival_06
text: Well, well, if it isn't Auntie Mage.
text_simple: well well if it isnt auntie mage

name: odest_rival_07
text: Tiny, your stones are hardly precious enough to collect.
text_simple: tiny your stones are hardly precious enough to collect

name: odest_rival_08
text: Your blades, Pudge, were as dull as your wits.
text_simple: your blades pudge were as dull as your wits

name: odest_rival_09
text: That's Pudge for you. Always missing the point.
text_simple: thats pudge for you always missing the point

name: odest_rival_10
text: I heard you were heavy but I found you not so.
text_simple: i heard you were heavy but i found you not so

name: odest_rival_12
text: It was no trouble to carry you off.
text_simple: it was no trouble to carry you off

name: odest_rival_13
text: You let yourself get carried away.
text_simple: you let yourself get carried away
pretty_criteria: Killing Viper (20% chance)|A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: odest_rival_16
text: You are the ill wind beneath my wings.
text_simple: you are the ill wind beneath my wings

text: The worst is still to come.
text_simple: the worst is still to come
